record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - September 27, 2008)

[Page: S10016]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Pete Evans, a fellow in the office of Senator Domenici, and Peggy Mallow, a member of his staff, be granted floor privileges for the remainder of the day.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
